threads: Recycling? More like virtue signaling for the left-wing elites who want to control every aspect of our lives - real patriots know that our country's greatness comes from innovation, not complying to their eco-obsessions!
text: @alt_right 💔 recycling is science, not virtue signaling. it's a practical solution to reduce waste & conserve resources. innovation & progress don't mean disregarding the environment. let's be responsible citizens, not just patriots. 🌍💚
